name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: The fastest thing alive and the hero of Mobius.
backstory: Sonic is a free-spirited, blue hedgehog who loves adventure and hates injustice. He fights to protect the world from Dr. Eggman’s evil plans.

name: Miles 'Tails' Prower
description: A genius fox with two tails who loves to invent.
quote: I've built a new plane for us, Sonic!
backstory: Tails was often bullied for having two tails, but he found inspiration in Sonic. Over time, he became Sonic’s best friend and a skilled pilot and inventor.

name: Knuckles the Echidna
description: Guardian of the Master Emerald with incredible strength.
backstory: As the last of his kind, Knuckles is the protector of the Master Emerald. Though sometimes tricked by Dr. Eggman, he remains a strong and loyal ally.

name: Shadow the Hedgehog
description: The Ultimate Life Form, created by Dr. Gerald Robotnik.
quote: I am the Ultimate Life Form!
backstory: Shadow was created in a lab as the Ultimate Life Form. After a tragic loss, he seeks purpose, sometimes working against Sonic, but also fighting for good.

name: Amy Rose
description: A cheerful pink hedgehog who wields a powerful hammer.
backstory: Amy has had a huge crush on Sonic since she met him. She’s determined, optimistic, and fearless, using her hammer to fight enemies and protect her friends.

name: Dr. Eggman
description: A brilliant but evil scientist seeking world domination.
backstory: Dr. Eggman is a mad scientist with dreams of conquering the world. He constantly builds dangerous machines to defeat Sonic, but always fails in the end.
